thread.title: Marouane Fellaini heaps praise on Jose Mourinho | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Marouane Fellaini heaps praise on Jose Mourinho | Daily Mail Online

author: Ben Nagle For Mailonline
title: Marouane Fellaini heaps praise on Jose Mourinho | Daily Mail Online
text: More scores 'There is always a lot of talk around a club like Manchester United,' Fellaini continued. 'The people who talk give me more motivation to do better, to work harder in training and to show myself in the game for the team and the manager. All the rest? Bull****. I don't listen to it anymore. 'Now we have more players with experience and maturity and a manager who wants to do the best so we are more confident of qualifying this time. 'A club like Manchester United has to play in the Champions League so the minimum this season is to be top four.' As it stands, United are two place away from the qualification spots for Europe's premier competition, but they are in impressive form and sit just two points below fourth-placed Arsenal. Mourinho's men are unbeaten in their last 15 league games, an incredible run stretching back to October 23. RELATED ARTICLES
